Beach.description: The beach is your starting point...you feel exhausted but must find your way out of here. You can move East, West, or North from here.

item.name: Fishing Net
item.description: A ragged fishing net. Still useful to catch fish, even though some holes exist...

item.name: Knife
item.description: A rusted Bowie Knife. Still sharp enough to cause problems.

item.name: Backpack
item.description: An old military issue backpack. This can hold many items!

Boat Crash Site.description: The remnants of the wreckage from a boat are washed ashore...some items are thrown about. Where is everyone else? You can move West from here

item.name: Fish
item.description: A live fish from the ocean! Perhaps a tuna of some kind? This could be useful to feed something...

item.name: Safe Key
item.description: A rusty key that appears to open something. Ingen is etched on the side but faded...

Fishing Hole.description: A whirlpool near the coast that has some settled water. You see some fish swimming around in the pool.

item.name: paddle
item.description: An old oar that used to help boats paddle along. How did it end up in the jungle? Did someone use it to protect themselves?...

Jungle.description: You enter a thick, lush jungle full of different plants and animals making a variety of sounds. The humidity beats down upon you, as you journey continues. You can go east from here, however it appears there could be another path..

item.name: Rope
item.description: A rope that is frayed but still could be used to hold something together

item.name: Wood Planks Pile
item.description: A pile of wood planks that could be used to build something useful!

Village.description: A bustling town of villagers who live on the island. There are many members trading, hunting, and building new houses. They are friendly to you, since you have been deemed worthy by the Magic Totem

item.name: Locked Safe
item.description: A safe that seems to have been closed for ages...I wonder what could be inside?

item.name: Flare Gun
item.description: A flare gun that could be used to signal for help! However...there is no flare...

Abandoned Research Facility.description: An abandoned research facility that is overgrown with vegetation and run down...It seems this place used to conduct some science experiments a long time ago?

item.name: Flare Round
item.description: A flare round that could be shot out of a flare gun...this could help me escape!

Mountain Peak.description: The top of the mountain on the island. You can see the ocean and all sides from this point, so can anyone passing by...perhaps a shipping vessel!
